title: 04/12/21: Change in Emprez's security model
content: Some companies have, by default, a rule that when an employee tries to access the service (with the wrong password) more than three times, their account is deactivated and their supervisor must re-activate it.These situations cause problems for a good number of users, especially on evenings and weekends, when superiors are unavailable.In order to make it easier for those who are not interested in this function, we have decided to deactivate it for everyone, but to allow those who want it to be able to activate it themselves. To know how to activate this function, click here.In addition to this, you need to know more about it.Â As a reminder, if you have to reactivate an employee's account following several incorrect password attempts, here is the procedure to follow: Reactivate an account.If you choose not to reactivate this option, your account will still be secure, as you will need the correct password to access it.Helpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
